vulnerabilities.title: Low-cost oracle update allows price manipulation
vulnerabilities.description: BonqDAO used TellorFlex oracle which allowed anyone to submit price updates by staking TRB tokens (only ~$175 at the time). Attacker staked minimal TRB, submitted manipulated WALBT price, and borrowed against inflated collateral.
vulnerabilities.rootCause: Oracle update cost too low relative to extractable value, no sanity checks on price submissions
